page.title: 03AYLESCOTT DRIERS,BURRINGTON
page.content: {AYLESCOTT DRIERS} The plant processes fresh cut grass into{pellets for animal feed.}Grass is brought to the pad where it is conveyed into a tumble drier for about a minute.Then it is milled into a powder which is compressed into grass pellets.60 tons can be made in a day, but only 30 in wet weather.4,500 tons of pellets are produced in the summer.These are stored until the winter,when they are sold to farmers, either direct or through merchants. Recently,{additives}such as cereals, proteins, minerals, molasses, sugar beet and vitamins have resulted in the pellets being made into a {complete food}for cattle, sheep, goats or horses.The equipment is designed to save energy.Four years ago the evaporator was the first of its type anywhere in the world.
